Subject: Patch upgrade to the latest version.
Description:
We are on the below version and need to patch to the latest version to resolve defects that have been identified.

Name                                          Version   InstallDate
----                                          -------   -----------
Netwrix Access Information Center             11.6.0.14 20240604   
Netwrix Activity Monitor                      7.0.3076  20240329   
Netwrix Activity Monitor Agent 64-bit         7.0.3076  20240329   
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor V11.6              11.6.0.76 20240604   
Netwrix Sensitive Data Discovery Add-On V11.6 11.6.0.12 20240604
Solution_Comment__c:
Upgraded the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Environment:

FROM:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                11.6.0.76
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)         11.6.0.14
NEA Sensitive Data (SDD)                            11.6.0.12
Netwrix Activity Monitor (NAM)                  7.0.3076


TO:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                11.6.0.84
NEA Access Information Center (AIC)         11.6.0.21

We also set the PageFile to only use the E: drive to mitigate potential issues with the SDD Scans. *** REBOOT required ***
 
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Installation > Installation & Configuration Overview > Enterprise Auditor Console Upgrade > Enterprise Auditor Core Upgrade Instructions
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Upgrade/Wizard.htm

Netwrix Access Information Center 11.6 > Installation Overview > Upgrade Procedure
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_11.6/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Upgrade.htm

Ref:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 Bug Fix List
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6_ReleaseNotes/resource/Netwrix_Enterprise_Auditor_11.6_BugFixList.pdf
Account_Name__c: FCCI Services, Inc. (formerly FCCI Insurance Group)
